# Axion Deep Labs

> Custom software development company specializing in web applications, mobile apps, AI-powered solutions, and enterprise software.

Axion Deep Labs is a research-driven software development company that partners with startups and enterprises to build scalable, production-ready software. We combine deep technical expertise with innovative thinking to deliver solutions that drive growth.

## Services

- Custom Software Development
- Web Application Development (React, Next.js, TypeScript)
- Mobile App Development (iOS, Android, React Native)
- AI & Machine Learning Integration
- Backend & API Development (Python, FastAPI, Node.js)
- Cloud & DevOps (AWS, GCP, CI/CD)
- Enterprise Software Solutions
- SaaS Platform Development

## Our Process

1. **Discovery** - Deep dive into business goals, users, and requirements
2. **Strategy** - Architecture design, tech stack selection, roadmap planning
3. **Build** - Agile development with weekly demos and continuous delivery
4. **Launch & Scale** - Deployment, monitoring, and ongoing iteration

## Products

- [QUANTA](https://quanta.axiondeep.com): Quantum computing education platform
- [Site2CRM](https://site2crm.io): AI-powered lead capture and analytics
- [Forma](https://axiondeep.com/projects/forma): Visual page builder
- [Vesper](https://axiondeep.com/projects/vesper): Security testing platform
- [Made4Founders](https://made4founders.com): Startup management platform

## Research

Project DRIFT: Investigating quantum system behavior and emergent properties in complex computational systems.
